body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Dennis Patterson and the customer's name is Kathleen Powell.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is Sarah, how may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm having trouble with my internet connection.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Could you provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Could you also confirm your address for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three Elm Street, Springfield.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. I will now run some diagnostics on your internet connection.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, John. Our team is working on resolving the issue. We will notify you once it is fixed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time and have a great day! Goodbye.
